entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
